projectGridLines.title: Strategic Support and Market Analysis
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Assist the founders in developing and executing the companyâ€™s strategic plan. Conduct

market research and competitive analysis to inform strategic decisions. Prepare presentations, reports,

and other materials for internal and external stakeholders. Proactively identify strategic opportunities

and manage self-driven projects with minimal supervision. Facilitate communication and coordination

across teams to ensure alignment with strategic objectives.


Skill sets: Market research, strategic planning, report writing, presentation skills, proactive and self-

managerial


Expected learning: Develop strategic thinking and market analysis skills, gain experience in preparing

strategic documents and presentations, learn to navigate and contribute to a startup environment,

experience firsthand how a startup operates, including the challenges and opportunities.

projectGridLines.title: Project Management and Operational Excellence
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Oversee the planning, execution, and completion of key projects. Coordinate cross-

functional teams to ensure alignment and timely delivery of project milestones. Identify and implement


process improvements to enhance operational efficiency. Proactively manage and drive projects,

ensuring minimal supervision is needed. Facilitate effective communication and coordination among

team members and external stakeholders to ensure smooth project execution.

Skill sets: Project management, process improvement, team coordination, operational management,

proactive and self-managerial

Expected learning: Gain hands-on experience in project management and operational efficiency,

develop skills in team coordination and process improvement, learn the intricacies of startup operations,

and understand the dynamic nature of startup environments
